CustomField.description: This field is automatically populated by the RollUpPro admin tool with the unique parent-child relationship name. This defines the link between parent and child objects (e.g., ChildObject__c or CustomRelationship__r). Use this field to verify that the correct relationship is applied. Do not modify this field manually, as it is system-generated to ensure accurate query execution.

Do not modify this field manually, as it is system-generated to ensure accurate query execution.
CustomField.label: Child Relationship Name
